title: Group
description: A group in the DTCG specification

$type.description: The type for tokens in this group (inherited by nested tokens unless overridden)

$description.description: A plain text description of the group

$extends.description: Reference to another group to inherit tokens and properties from

$root.description: Root token for this group. The $root token provides a base value for the group while allowing for variants or extensions.

^[^${}.][^{}.]*$.description: Nested groups and tokens (see ./format.json#/definitions/tokenOrGroupName for pattern definition)
